title: Open Channel Management - Channel
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic channel made for Open Channel Management (raw-water systems)

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

downstreamNode.description: Relationship. A relationship indicating the ID of the downstream node (junction, regulation structure) – where a channel ends

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

upstreamNode.description: Relationship. A relationship indicating the ID of the upstream node (junction, regulation structure) – where a channel begins

geometry.description: Description of the geometry of a channel.

geometryType.description: Property. Text defining the geometry of a channel. Enum:'Trapezoidal, Circular']

bottomSlope.description: Property. The bottom slope of the channel in the case of 'Trapezoidal' type. All units are accepted in CEFACT code

leftSideSlope.description: Property. The slope of the left bank of the channel in the case of 'Trapezoidal' type. All units are accepted in CEFACT code

rightSideSlope.description: Property. The slope of the right bank of the channel in the case of 'Trapezoidal' type. All units are accepted in CEFACT code

bottomWidth.description: Property. The bottom width of the channel in the case of 'Trapezoidal' type. All units are accepted in CEFACT code

diameter.description: Property. The diameter of a circular channel

maxWaterDepth.description: Property. The maximum allowable water depth of the channel. All units are accepted in CEFACT code

roughnessCoefficient.description: Property. The Manning’s roughness coefficient for free surface flow

flowType.description: Enum:'Free-Surface flow'. Text defining the type of flow in the channel

celerity.description: Property. Velocity of a surge propagated along the channel after the opening or close of a sluice gate

travelDuration.description: Property. The duration of the surge which travels from the downstream junction (sluice gate) to the upstream junction (sluice gate)

waterLoss.description: Property. Water leakages/losses - a flow number or a percentage of flow

length.description: Property. The length of the channel. All units are accepted in CEFACT code
